availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, merchant. Lawrence County, Kentucky, native. Son of Moses Preston, Sr. Married to Nancy Marion Laird Preston on May 31, 1854. Married to Julia Brown Preston on September 24, 1856. Father of South G. Preston, Emily A. Preston, Francis A. Preston, and Thomas G. Preston. Clerk in Johnson County in 1850. Merchant in Johnson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 81A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 2.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, Paintsville, p. 38.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, County Marriages, Film #001912950, p. 191.
Kentucky Marriage Records on Microfilm (1852-1914), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Johnson County Marriages, p. 5.
Find A Grave, "Martin Preston (1828-1891)," Memorial #39221013, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/39221013# (accessed November 6, 2018).
